CSSAlign-self.summary: The align-self CSS property overrides a grid or flex item's {{cssxref("align-items")}} value. In Grid, it aligns the item inside the Grid Areas. In Flexbox, it aligns the item on the cross axis.

remarks.para: The property doesn't apply to block-level boxes, or to table cells. If a flexbox item's cross-axis margin is auto, then align-self is ignored.
